manoroga niwaranaya pinisa pujawaliyehi: “rajahu bodhisathwa paramithawehi wiyyirwa dawana pinisa ha sinhala bhashawa danna sathpurushajanayan ge boho kalak shrawaddhabuddhi jananaya karawa thriwidha wu sampath sadhadena pinisa ha nawawana buddhothpada kshana sampaththiya laddaාwu me mage da abhimatha wu prarthanawa sadhaganna pinisa liyu “yogarnawayehi” shoka sithin wu kshayarogihata nruthyi githawadyadiyen nithya yen sathutu karawanu, eluwan athurare situwanu-wanduran dakwa luhubandayanu-sthri n ha sipaganwanu, me aadiyen samana we.” (93 pita uthuni leyata: sandun thakesaru mi lamandu manel ala kakara kiri pewanu: manawe” ( 204 pita)- yamek athin wakla ho isin wakla ho yoniyata aaye da, yamek ek payakin yoniyata aaye da, yamek ek payakin wan gudayata aaye da, mohu hama dena sathin kapa hala yuththaha. (207-pita) prijanashtayata: rath kumbauk sumbaulu la kawudumas pisa sathdawasak denu (199 pita) ho pruyogarathnawaliyehi: mimasmarata: nupun asala walpenela babila thunmul uthuni kenek lawa genwa ilapatha muna gasanu, manawe.” (110 pita) nathahoth “ measuwath sarpayo deාlos awruddak nokath” yi manthrathayak ho liyayi.
